Sentencas: A novel solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) type catalytic reactor utilizing partial oxidation of methane (CH4 + 1/20(2) = CO+2H(2)) as internal reforming reaction was investigated in the present study.
Titulo: Partial oxidation of methane over fuel cell type reactor for simultaneous generation of synthesis gas and electric power

Sentencas: Large electric power, CO-H-2 mixture with molar ratio of 2, and heat energy were obtained simultaneously by applying LaGaO3 based perovskite as electrolyte of fuel cells.
Titulo: Partial oxidation of methane over fuel cell type reactor for simultaneous generation of synthesis gas and electric power

Sentencas: Since LaGaO3 based oxide exhibits fast oxide ion conduction, large electric power was obtained.
Titulo: Partial oxidation of methane over fuel cell type reactor for simultaneous generation of synthesis gas and electric power

Sentencas: The electric power was further increased by doping small amount of Co or Fe, whilst the open circuit potential decreased due to hole conduction.
Titulo: Partial oxidation of methane over fuel cell type reactor for simultaneous generation of synthesis gas and electric power

Sentencas: In spite of 0.5 mm thickness of electrolyte, a maximum power density and yield of synthesis gas were obtained at 731 mW/cm(2) and 21 % at 1273 K respectively on the cell for which Fe doped LaGaO3 based oxide was used.
Titulo: Partial oxidation of methane over fuel cell type reactor for simultaneous generation of synthesis gas and electric power

Sentencas: In addition, partial oxidation of methane only occurred in the cell, since the molar ratio of formed CO and H-2 was always 1/2.
Titulo: Partial oxidation of methane over fuel cell type reactor for simultaneous generation of synthesis gas and electric power

Sentencas: Therefore, partial oxidation of methane with SOFC is highly attractive from simultaneous generation of energy and useful compound.
Titulo: Partial oxidation of methane over fuel cell type reactor for simultaneous generation of synthesis gas and electric power
